attributes.action: Allow the wives of native British men to have automatic Indefinite Leave To Remain as long as they financially support the spouse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My wife was refused a "Indfinite Leave To Remain" visa despite me being a native British citzen, having my own business, owning my own house and my wife being in the UK for 13 years.
It was refused because we didn't have enough letters with her name on!
British men who can financially support their wife should automatically get this visa. The Home Office has made our life a nightmare.
